articles.title: Iran refuses to hand over airliner's black box: report

articles.title: Iran hit with magnitude 4.9 earthquake near nuclear plant
articles.description: A magnitude 4.9 earthquake hit Iran early Wednesday morning after a volatile day in the region, according to the United States Geological Survey.
articles.content:
A magnitude 4.9 earthquake hit Iran early Wednesday morning on a volatile day in the region, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
The quake struck in the southwestern part of the country near the Bushehr nuclear plant.
